name: THRIVE-mobile
overview:
THRIVE designs and develops amazing apps for the iPhone, iPad, Android and Blackberry platforms.

Our expert programming team works with clients to design and build fast reliable apps that push the boundary of design, innovation and functionality. With Art Direction provided by THRIVE Chief Creative Officer Eric Johnston our apps are designed to look gorgeous and stand out in the crowd. We work closely with clients to develop ideas and nurture them into world class Apps. We also develop amazing websites utilizing the latest programming standards and techniques. THRIVE merges design + function to produce apps and websites of the highest quality.

THRIVE is not a traditional developer that simply builds a program for you and then goes away. We are a versatile multifaceted Digital Media Agency that strives to build value for our clients. We work long term with our clients to provide valuable ongoing marketing support for everything we design and create. The THRIVE APPROACH is to design and develop beautiful apps and website, and then empower our clients to promote and market their app, website, product or company

Our job doesn’t end when development ends, we further guide and nurture our clients by creating and designing unique marketing campaigns around an app, a website, a product or a company. We blend traditional techniques with contemporary, Video, Internet and Social Marketing. THRIVE has partnered with top industry experts to provide world class SEO, SEM and PPC marketing services in order to create long term value and visibility for our clients and their brands.
